column4: I need help enabling desktop effects w/ an ati radeon mobility x300 on 9.10 Karmic. ??
I do not believe that card will work past Jaunty... I have the x200m running in jaunty without a problem though
easy way ... install openssh-server on ubuntu ... install filezilla on windows and use sftp
I have no clue.. what either one of those are..
google is your friend ... or 'sudo apt-get install openssh-server' on ubuntu terminal ... and then use this on your winbox http://filezilla-project.org/download.php
its installing..
are you wiping OSX off of it?
I am dual booting windows xp w/ ubuntu 9.10... I want to remotly connect to Ubuntu from a Windows computer
Its done installing.. what should i do now?
let it run
I cant find the application.. where should it be?
Hey I got it im supposed to run the remote desktop application that came with ubuntu, i got remote desktop working on the local net work
will this setup work on the INTERnet?
Hey yesterday you told me to install some thing to get me remote desktop working could that have by done some thing to my wireless internet drivers?
no, what did I tell you to install?
that was openssh-server .... and on the windows side is the filezilla client
differnet subjects ... regardless, that wouldn't effect wireless
All right thats fine.. I was just wondering because that was the last thing i did to the computer.. Can you help me get the wireless working?
pkill gnome-panel
I killed it.. I re-generated.. the wireless is still not there
I have an x200m .. jockey did what it was supposed to do
please ask your questions to the room, I am following, but not currently in support mode, actually supporting realworld rightnow
